chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
n: nat
zero: pos n
dst: pos n
src: pos n
Hsd: src <> dst
Hsz: src <> zero
Hdz: dst <> zero
i: nat
dst': pos n
k: nat
w: Vector.t nat n
v: Vector.t nat n

Goal:
v#>src = k -> v#>zero = 0 -> w = v[0/src][(2 * k + (v#>dst))/dst] -> (i, mm_mul2) // (i, v) -+> (4 + i, w)

Premises:
Notation pos := Fin.t
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope
mm_mul2 = DECₐ src (4 + i) :: INCₐ dst :: INCₐ dst' :: DECₐ zero i :: nil : list (mm_instr (pos n))
mm_transfert_progress : forall src dst zero : pos n, src <> dst -> src <> zero -> dst <> zero -> forall (i : nat) (v : vec nat n) (st : nat * vec nat n), v#>dst = 0 -> v#>zero = 0 -> st = (3 + i, v[0/src][(v#>src)/dst]) -> (i, mm_transfert src dst zero i) // (i, v) -+> st
mm_null_progress : forall src zero : pos n, src <> zero -> forall (i : nat) (v : vec nat n) (st : nat * vec nat n), v#>zero = 0 -> st = (2 + i, v[0/src]) -> (i, mm_null src zero i) // (i, v) -+> st
mm_div2_progress_1 : forall src quo rem : pos n, src <> quo -> src <> rem -> quo <> rem -> forall (i : nat) (v : vec nat n) (k : nat) (st : nat * vec nat n), v#>quo = 0 -> v#>rem = 0 -> div2 (v#>src) = (k, One) -> st = (6 + i, v[0/src][k/quo][1/rem]) -> (i, mm_div2 src quo rem i) // (i, v) -+> st
mm_div2_progress_0 : forall src quo rem : pos n, src <> quo -> src <> rem -> quo <> rem -> forall (i : nat) (v : vec nat n) (k : nat) (st : nat * vec nat n), v#>quo = 0 -> v#>rem = 0 -> div2 (v#>src) = (k, Zero) -> st = (6 + i, v[0/src][k/quo][0/rem]) -> (i, mm_div2 src quo rem i) // (i, v) -+> st
mm_div2_progress : forall src quo rem : pos n, src <> quo -> src <> rem -> quo <> rem -> forall (i : nat) (v : vec nat n), v#>quo = 0 -> v#>rem = 0 -> let (k, b) := div2 (v#>src) in (i, mm_div2 src quo rem i) // (i, v) -+> (6 + i, v[0/src][k/quo][(if b then 1 else 0)/rem])
pos_S_inv : forall p : pos (S ?n), (p = pos0) + {q : pos ?n | p = pos_nxt q} where ?n : [n : nat src : pos n dst : pos n zero : pos n Hsd : src <> dst Hsz : src <> zero Hdz : dst <> zero i : nat dst' := dst : pos n k : nat v : vec nat n w : vec nat n |- nat]
VectorDef.caseS' : forall (v0 : vec ?A (S ?n)) (P : vec ?A (S ?n) -> Type), (forall (h : ?A) (t : vec ?A ?n), P (h ## t)) -> P v0 where ?A : [n : nat src : pos n dst : pos n zero : pos n Hsd : src <> dst Hsz : src <> zero Hdz : dst <> zero i : nat dst' := dst : pos n k : nat v : vec nat n w : vec nat n |- Type] ?n : [n : nat src : pos n dst : pos n zero : pos n Hsd : src <> dst Hsz : src <> zero Hdz : dst <> zero i : nat dst' := dst : pos n k : nat v : vec nat n w : vec nat n |- nat]
VectorDef.splitat : forall l r : nat, vec ?A (l + r) -> vec ?A l * vec ?A r where ?A : [n : nat src : pos n dst : pos n zero : pos n Hsd : src <> dst Hsz : src <> zero Hdz : dst <> zero i : nat dst' := dst : pos n k : nat v : vec nat n w : vec nat n |- Type]
VectorDef.rect2 : forall P : forall n0 : nat, vec ?A n0 -> vec ?B n0 -> Type, P 0 vec_nil vec_nil ->...-> forall (n0 : nat) (v1 : vec ?A n0) (v2 : vec ?B n0), P n0 v1 v2 where ?A : [n : nat src : pos n dst : pos n zero : pos n Hsd : src <> dst Hsz : src <> zero Hdz : dst <> zero i : nat dst' := dst : pos n k : nat v : vec nat n w : vec nat n |- Type] ?B : [n : nat src : pos n dst : pos n zero : pos n Hsd : src <> dst Hsz : src <> zero Hdz : dst <> zero i : nat dst' := dst : pos n k : nat v : vec nat n w : vec nat n |- Type]
mm_nullify_compute : forall (zero : pos n) (i : nat) (lr : list (pos n)) (v w : vec nat n), v#>zero = 0 -> (forall p : pos n, In p lr -> p <> zero) -> (forall p : pos n, In p lr -> w#>p = 0) -> (forall p : pos n, ~ In p lr -> w#>p = v#>p) -> (i, mm_nullify zero i lr) // (i, v) -> > (length (mm_nullify zero i lr) + i, w)
mm_steps_DEC_1_inv : forall (n k : nat) (P : nat * list (mm_instr (pos n))) (i : nat) (x : pos n) (p : nat) (v : vec nat n) (u : nat) (st : nat * vec nat n), (i, DECₐ x p :: nil) <sc P -> k <> 0 -> v#>x = S u -> P // (i, v) -[k] -> st -> exists k' : nat, k' < k /\ P // (1 + i, v[u/x]) -[k'] -> st
mm_steps_DEC_0_inv : forall (n k : nat) (P : nat * list (mm_instr (pos n))) (i : nat) (x : pos n) (p : nat) (v : vec nat n) (st : nat * vec nat n), (i, DECₐ x p :: nil) <sc P -> k <> 0 -> v#>x = 0 -> P // (i, v) -[k] -> st -> exists k' : nat, k' < k /\ P // (p, v) -[k'] -> st
VectorDef.rectS : forall P : forall n0 : nat, vec ?A (S n0) -> Type, (forall a : ?A, P 0 (a ## vec_nil)) -> (forall (a : ?A) (n0 : nat) (v0 : vec ?A (S n0)), P n0 v0 -> P (S n0) (a ## v0)) -> forall (n0 : nat) (v : vec ?A (S n0)), P n0 v where ?A : [n : nat src : pos n dst : pos n zero : pos n Hsd : src <> dst Hsz : src <> zero Hdz : dst <> zero i : nat dst' := dst : pos n k : nat v : vec nat n w : vec nat n |- Type]
VectorDef.caseS : forall P : forall n0 : nat, vec ?A (S n0) -> Type, (forall (h : ?A) (n0 : nat) (t : vec ?A n0), P n0 (h ## t)) -> forall (n0 : nat) (v : vec ?A (S n0)), P n0 v where ?A : [n : nat src : pos n dst : pos n zero : pos n Hsd : src <> dst Hsz : src <> zero Hdz : dst <> zero i : nat dst' := dst : pos n k : nat v : vec nat n w : vec nat n |- Type]
mm_steps_INC_inv : forall (n k : nat) (P : nat * list (mm_instr (pos n))) (i : nat) (x : pos n) (v : vec nat n) (st : nat * vec nat n), (i, INCₐ x :: nil) <sc P -> k <> 0 -> P // (i, v) -[k] -> st -> exists k' : nat, k' < k /\ P // (1 + i, v[(S (v#>x))/x]) -[k'] -> st
mm_progress_DEC_S : forall (n : nat) (P : nat * list (mm_instr (pos n))) (i : nat) (x : pos n) (k : nat) (v : vec nat n) (u : nat) (st : nat * vec nat n), (i, DECₐ x k :: nil) <sc P -> v#>x = S u -> P // (1 + i, v[u/x]) -> > st -> P // (i, v) -+> st
mm_progress_DEC_0 : forall (n : nat) (P : nat * list (mm_instr (pos n))) (i : nat) (x : pos n) (k : nat) (v : vec nat n) (st : nat * vec nat n), (i, DECₐ x k :: nil) <sc P -> v#>x = 0 -> P // (k, v) -> > st -> P // (i, v) -+> st
mm_compute_DEC_S : forall (n : nat) (P : nat * list (mm_instr (pos n))) (i : nat) (x : pos n) (k : nat) (v : vec nat n) (u : nat) (st : nat * vec nat n), (i, DECₐ x k :: nil) <sc P -> v#>x = S u -> P // (1 + i, v[u/x]) -> > st -> P // (i, v) -> > st
mm_transfert = fun (src dst zero : pos n) (i : nat) => DECₐ src (3 + i) :: INCₐ dst :: DECₐ zero i :: nil : pos n -> pos n -> pos n -> nat -> list (mm_instr (pos n)) Arguments mm_transfert _ _ _ _%nat_scope
mm_compute_DEC_0 : forall (n : nat) (P : nat * list (mm_instr (pos n))) (i : nat) (x : pos n) (k : nat) (v : vec nat n) (st : nat * vec nat n), (i, DECₐ x k :: nil) <sc P -> v#>x = 0 -> P // (k, v) -> > st -> P // (i, v) -> > st
mm_sss_DEC0_inv : forall (n : nat) (x : pos n) (k i : nat) (v : vec nat n) (j : nat) (w : vec nat n), v#>x = 0 -> mm_sss (DECₐ x k) (i, v) (j, w) -> j = k /\ w = v
mm_div2 = fun (src quo rem : pos n) (i : nat) => DECₐ src (6 + i) :: INCₐ rem :: DECₐ src (i + 6) :: DECₐ rem (4 + i) :: INCₐ quo :: DECₐ rem i :: nil : pos n -> pos n -> pos n -> nat -> list (mm_instr (pos n)) Arguments mm_div2 _ _ _ _%nat_scope
mm_progress_INC : forall (n : nat) (P : nat * list (mm_instr (pos n))) (i : nat) (x : pos n) (v : vec nat n) (st : nat * vec nat n), (i, INCₐ x :: nil) <sc P -> P // (1 + i, v[(S (v#>x))/x]) -> > st -> P // (i, v) -+> st
mm_transfert_length : forall (src dst zero : pos n) (i : nat), length (mm_transfert src dst zero i) = 3
mm_null = fun (src zero : pos n) (i : nat) => DECₐ src (2 + i) :: DECₐ zero i :: nil : pos n -> pos n -> nat -> list (mm_instr (pos n)) Arguments mm_null _ _ _%nat_scope
vec_eq_dec : forall X : Type, (forall x y : X, {x = y} + {x <> y}) -> forall (n : nat) (u v : vec X n), {u = v} + {u <> v}
in_mma_sss_dec_0 : forall (n i : nat) (x : pos n) (k : nat) (v : vec nat n), v#>x = 0 -> mma_sss (DECₐ x k) (i, v) (1 + i, v)
vec_one_spec_neq : forall (n : nat) (p q : pos n), p <> q -> vec_one p#>q = 0
mm_sss_sind : forall (n : nat) (P : mm_instr (pos n) -> mm_state n -> mm_state n -> SProp), (forall (i : nat) (x : pos n) (v : vec nat n), P (INCₐ x) (i, v) (1 + i, v[(S (v#>x))/x])) -> (forall (i : nat) (x : pos n) (k : nat) (v : vec nat n), v#>x = 0 -> P (DECₐ x k) (i, v) (k, v)) -> (forall (i : nat) (x : pos n) (k : nat) (v : vec nat n) (u : nat), v#>x = S u -> P (DECₐ x k) (i, v) (1 + i, v[u/x])) -> forall (m : mm_instr (pos n)) (m0 m1 : mm_state n), mm_sss m m0 m1 -> P m m0 m1
mma_sss_ind : forall (n : nat) (P : mm_instr (pos n) -> mm_state n -> mm_state n -> Prop), (forall (i : nat) (x : pos n) (v : vec nat n), P (INCₐ x) (i, v) (1 + i, v[(S (v#>x))/x])) -> (forall (i : nat) (x : pos n) (k : nat) (v : vec nat n), v#>x = 0 -> P (DECₐ x k) (i, v) (1 + i, v)) -> (forall (i : nat) (x : pos n) (k : nat) (v : vec nat n) (u : nat), v#>x = S u -> P (DECₐ x k) (i, v) (k, v[u/x])) -> forall (m : mm_instr (pos n)) (m0 m1 : mm_state n), mma_sss m m0 m1 -> P m m0 m1
mma_sss_sind : forall (n : nat) (P : mm_instr (pos n) -> mm_state n -> mm_state n -> SProp), (forall (i : nat) (x : pos n) (v : vec nat n), P (INCₐ x) (i, v) (1 + i, v[(S (v#>x))/x])) -> (forall (i : nat) (x : pos n) (k : nat) (v : vec nat n), v#>x = 0 -> P (DECₐ x k) (i, v) (1 + i, v)) -> (forall (i : nat) (x : pos n) (k : nat) (v : vec nat n) (u : nat), v#>x = S u -> P (DECₐ x k) (i, v) (k, v[u/x])) -> forall (m : mm_instr (pos n)) (m0 m1 : mm_state n), mma_sss m m0 m1 -> P m m0 m1
mm_sss_ind : forall (n : nat) (P : mm_instr (pos n) -> mm_state n -> mm_state n -> Prop), (forall (i : nat) (x : pos n) (v : vec nat n), P (INCₐ x) (i, v) (1 + i, v[(S (v#>x))/x])) -> (forall (i : nat) (x : pos n) (k : nat) (v : vec nat n), v#>x = 0 -> P (DECₐ x k) (i, v) (k, v)) -> (forall (i : nat) (x : pos n) (k : nat) (v : vec nat n) (u : nat), v#>x = S u -> P (DECₐ x k) (i, v) (1 + i, v[u/x])) -> forall (m : mm_instr (pos n)) (m0 m1 : mm_state n), mm_sss m m0 m1 -> P m m0 m1
sss_steps_inv : forall (instr : Set) (data : Type) (one_step : instr -> nat * data -> nat * data -> Prop) (P : nat * list instr) (k : nat) (st1 st3 : nat * data), sss_steps one_step P k st1 st3 -> (k = 0 /\ st1 = st3) + {k' : nat | exists st2 : nat * data, k = S k' /\ sss_step one_step P st1 st2 /\ sss_steps one_step P k' st2 st3}
mm_sss_DEC1_inv : forall (n : nat) (x : pos n) (k u i : nat) (v : vec nat n) (j : nat) (w : vec nat n), v#>x = S u -> mm_sss (DECₐ x k) (i, v) (j, w) -> j = 1 + i /\ w = v[u/x]
mm_compute_INC : forall (n : nat) (P : nat * list (mm_instr (pos n))) (i : nat) (x : pos n) (v : vec nat n) (st : nat * vec nat n), (i, INCₐ x :: nil) <sc P -> P // (1 + i, v[(S (v#>x))/x]) -> > st -> P // (i, v) -> > st
VectorEq.eq_dec : forall (A : Type) (A_beq : A -> A -> bool), (forall x y : A, A_beq x y = One <-> x = y) -> forall (n : nat) (v1 v2 : vec A n), {v1 = v2} + {v1 <> v2}
Inductive mm_sss (n : nat) : mm_instr (pos n) -> mm_state n -> mm_state n -> Prop := in_mm_sss_inc : forall (i : nat) (x : pos n) (v : vec nat n), mm_sss (INCₐ x) (i, v) (1 + i, v[(S (v#>x))/x]) | in_mm_sss_dec_0 : forall (i : nat) (x : pos n) (k : nat) (v : vec nat n), v#>x = 0 ->...-> mm_sss (DECₐ x k) (i, v) (1 + i, v[u/x]) Arguments mm_sss [n]%nat_scope Arguments in_mm_sss_inc [n]%nat_scope _%nat_scope Arguments in_mm_sss_dec_0 [n]%nat_scope _%nat_scope _ _%nat_scope Arguments in_mm_sss_dec_1 [n]%nat_scope _%nat_scope _ _%nat_scope _ [u]%nat_scope
Inductive mma_sss (n : nat) : mm_instr (pos n) -> mm_state n -> mm_state n -> Prop := in_mma_sss_inc : forall (i : nat) (x : pos n) (v : vec nat n), mma_sss (INCₐ x) (i, v) (1 + i, v[(S (v#>x))/x]) | in_mma_sss_dec_0 : forall (i : nat) (x : pos n) (k : nat) (v : vec nat n), v#>x = 0 ->...-> mma_sss (DECₐ x k) (i, v) (k, v[u/x]) Arguments mma_sss [n]%nat_scope Arguments in_mma_sss_inc [n]%nat_scope _%nat_scope Arguments in_mma_sss_dec_0 [n]%nat_scope _%nat_scope _ _%nat_scope Arguments in_mma_sss_dec_1 [n]%nat_scope _%nat_scope _ _%nat_scope _ [u]%nat_scope
mm_sss_INC_inv : forall (n : nat) (x : pos n) (i : nat) (v : vec nat n) (j : nat) (w : vec nat n), mm_sss (INCₐ x) (i, v) (j, w) -> j = 1 + i /\ w = v[(S (v#>x))/x]
BinInt.Z.le = fun x y : BinNums.Z => BinInt.Z.compare x y <> Gt : BinNums.Z -> BinNums.Z -> Prop Arguments BinInt.Z.le (_ _)%Z_scope

``` 
intros.
unfold mm_mul2.
apply SSS_seq with (i, v)[0/src][(v#>src)/dst].
apply SSS_seq with (S i, v[v#>src/src]).
apply mm_null_progress; auto.
apply mm_null_progress; auto.
apply mm_transfert_progress; auto.
apply mm_transfert_length.
Qed.
```
